Subject: Your Rewards Points are About to Expire!

Dear [Customer's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out with a friendly reminder from your favorite spot for all things delicious—Delphi's Delights. 

We're thrilled you've been a part of our loyalty program, and we want to make sure you get the most out of your rewards. You currently have **3,250 rewards points** that are set to expire in just **3 short days**.

To make the most of these points and enjoy some delightful treats, simply click on our [Rewards Portal]. From there, you can instantly redeem your points for exciting drinks like Persephone’s Pomegranate Tea, Dionysus' Divine Cocoa, or the fan-favorite, Aphrodite’s Rose Latte. Each sip can be an adventure, and we don't want you to miss out!

As the Loyalty Program Manager, it’s my goal to ensure you get to experience all the fantastic flavors we offer. This is your friendly nudge to indulge yourself with something sweet and comforting, using points you've earned.

Thank you for being such a valued member of the Delphi's Delights community. Should you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me directly. We're always here to help you savor every moment.

Warm regards,

Robert Simmons  
Loyalty Program Manager  
Delphi’s Delights
